alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 16 at 7:11PM CST until December 20 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Thatcher L&D affecting Union, Calhoun and Bradley Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. Cache River Near Patterson affecting Jackson and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Thatcher L&D. * WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 78.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 80.0 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 79.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Ouachita River Thatcher L&D 79.0 78.6 Fri 6 PM 79.7 79.8 78.8 80.0 6 AM 12/18 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
